title: Ducati to drive in 11 models in India this year
description: "We promised to launch 15 new models at the start of 2021, and despite the tumultuous year for the auto sector, we managed to keep that promise, and now the BSVI range for Ducati is complete in India," Ducati India Managing Director Bipul Chandra said in a statement.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
